member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Engine
member.summary: Global variable for the library

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Engine.Provider
member.summary: Select the calculating engine

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.ProviderEngine
member.summary: Provider engine selection

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.ProviderEngine.MathNet
member.summary: MathNet

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.ProviderEngine.IntelIPP
member.summary: Intel IPP, place Intel IPP dlls under \NativeDLLs\intel64 for x64 platform and \NativeDLLs\ia32 for x86 platform before use Intel IPP as the provider engine

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult
member.summary: The result of capability calculation

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Mu
member.summary: The mean value of samples

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Sigma
member.summary: The standard deviation of samples

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.P
member.summary: The probability of samples that within the limit

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Pl
member.summary: The probability of samples that below than the low limit

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Pu
member.summary: The probability of samples that higher than the high limit

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Cp
member.summary: (High - Low)/(6*Sigma)

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Cpl
member.summary: (Mu - L)./(3*sigma)

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Cpu
member.summary: (U - Mu)/(3*Sigma)

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Cpk
member.summary: min(Cpl, Cpu)

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.CapabilityResult.Ca
member.summary: (Sigma-C)/(Et*0.5)

member.summary: The order of data

member.summary: Calculate by row

member.summary: Calculate by column

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics
member.summary: Statistical functions based on MathNet and Intel IPP, to use Intel IPP platform, please place intel IPP dll in the same folder of SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.dll. \NativeDLLs\ia32 for x86 platform and \NativeDLLs\intel64 for x64 platform.

member.summary: Find the Maximum value from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.summary: Find the Minimum value from the double array(supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.summary: Find the Mean value from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.summary: Find the RMS value from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.StandardDeviation(System.Double[])
member.summary: FInd the standard deviation from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Variance(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the variance from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.summary: Find the skewness from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet)

member.summary: Find the Kurtosis from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet)
